TrimAlignSort.aligner.description: Aligner to be used. Options are: ua, ua-meth, star. Mandatory if align step is selected.

TrimAlignSort.base_file_name.description: Base name for the output files.

TrimAlignSort.cpu.description: Number of cpus to be used for the tasks.

TrimAlignSort.input_cram_bam_list.description: List of input cram or bam files to be processed.

TrimAlignSort.ref_fastas_cram.description: List of references for CreateReferenceCache task.

TrimAlignSort.references.description: References for merging inputs into one file, alignment, and sorting.

TrimAlignSort.sample_name.description: Sample name for the merged cram file.

TrimAlignSort.sorter_params.description: Parameters for the sorter task. Mandatory if sort step is selected.

TrimAlignSort.star_align_extra_args.description: Extra arguments for the STAR aligner.

TrimAlignSort.star_align_gtf_override.description: GTF file to be used for STAR aligner.

TrimAlignSort.star_genome.description: Star genome file. If aligner is star, supllay either star genome file or generate new genome index.

TrimAlignSort.star_genome_generate_param.description: Parameters for generating the star genome. Mandatory if aligner is star and not given star genome file.

TrimAlignSort.steps.description: Steps to be executed in the pipeline.Options are: trim, align, sort

TrimAlignSort.trimmer_parameters.description: Parameters for the trimmer task. Mandatory if trim step is selected.

TrimAlignSort.ua_meth_parameters.description: Parameters for the UA meth aligner. Mandatory if aligner is ua-meth.

TrimAlignSort.ua_parameters.description: Parameters for the UA aligner. Mandatory if aligner is ua.
